instance_count.description: The number of worker nodes in your cluster. (Minimum: 3, Maximum 50)

instance_type.description: The type of instance used for the provisioned workers.

region.description: The AWS region where your cluster will be created.

k8s_version.description: Kubernetes version to apply to EKS. (See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eks/latest/userguide/kubernetes-versions.html for a list of supported options)

cluster_labels.description: Tags to be applied to resources in your cluster. (Optional)

email.description: Email address to send TLS certificate notifications to.
